metadata.jobDescription:
Product Manager (AI) at Crypto.com — leading AI integration across the
Crypto.com App for 150M+ global users. Strategic bridge between AI capabilities
and core UX. Integrate LLMs into features, scale AI-powered support tools,
optimize KYC flows. Cross-functional leadership with Engineering, Data
Infrastructure, and Design. Requires strong generative AI understanding,
data infrastructure knowledge, customer-facing AI product experience.
Crypto ecosystem familiarity is a plus.

hero.subheadline: Product Manager with AI deployment experience and deep crypto infrastructure background. Shipped LLM-powered support handling 1,000+ questions weekly at 98% accuracy. Eight years building for scale—from Microsoft blockchain serving 2.7B consumers to institutional crypto infrastructure.

about.tagline: AI-certified PM with eight years building crypto infrastructure—from enterprise blockchain at Microsoft to ETF-grade staking at Anchorage. Shipped my first production AI at Dapper Labs.
bio:
I recently completed Product Faculty's AI Product Management certification (instructed by Miqdad Jaffer, product leader at OpenAI) and shipped my first production AI at Dapper Labs—a kapa.ai support bot handling 1,000+ developer questions weekly with 98% accuracy. That deployment taught me how to translate LLM capabilities into measurable user outcomes while managing quality, latency, and edge cases at scale.
Before AI, I spent eight years building crypto infrastructure. At Anchorage I shipped ETF-grade staking for institutional clients including Galaxy and asset managers with billions in AUM. At Ankr I drove 15× revenue growth by pivoting our API platform to serve protocols like Polygon and Arbitrum. I started at Microsoft building Xbox royalties on Ethereum for 2.7B gaming consumers. Crypto.com's mission sits exactly at the intersection of my AI interest and crypto depth.

Consumer crypto product with 200+ DAU. Founder experience demonstrates 0→1 capability.
